description: Necesse is an impressive game but the graphics were a bit on the plain side. This changes dramatically on August 10 with the exciting Graphics Update.
title: Top-down Terraria-like 'Necesse' gets a huge graphics update on August 10

description: Inspired in parts by both Viva Pinata and Rollercoaster Tycoon, inDirection Games and Slug Disco just released Horticular and it's as sweet as they come.
title: Horticular is a beautifully relaxing garden-restoring game inspired by Viva Pinata

description: Besiege: The Splintered Sea Expansion was already really clever, and now it's just that little bit bigger and better thanks to a recent update.
title: Besiege: The Splintered Sea Expansion gets more levels in the latest update

description: It's almost time to get cutting some shapes, with the Early Access release of Shapez 2 coming on August 15.
title: Huge factory sim Shapez 2 releases on August 15 with over 300k wishlists

description: You have to hand it to JSAUX, they have something for everything at this point. And they just launched their new 6-in-1 JSAUX Dock that can be pulled apart. Compatible with the Steam Deck, ROG Ally / Ally X, Legion Go and no doubt many others if they all fit.
title: The new detachable JSAUX Dock will fit a Steam Deck, ROG Ally X, Legion Go and more

description: Hollow Survivors: Prologue is out today, giving us a slice of what to expect from this rogue-lite dungeon crawler where you play as one of the few remaining sane Hollows.
title: In Hollow Survivors: Prologue you play as one of the few remaining sane Hollows

description: Made with Godot Engine, ColdRidge is a cowboy themed Wild West turn-based exploration game that looks really worth your time.
title: Check out the demo for ColdRidge a Wild West turn-based exploration game

description: Tough times for indies, as Humble Games have confirmed they've done a "restructuring" of the publisher with previous staff saying everyone has been let go. This does not affect Humble Bundle / Humble Store though, as they were separate.
title: Humble Games confirmed a 'restructuring of operations' with reports of all staff gone
